001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.providers;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.base.BaseDriverProvider;
004import io.github.bonigarcia.wdm.WebDriverManager;
005import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
006import org.openqa.selenium.edge.EdgeDriver;
007import org.openqa.selenium.edge.EdgeDriverService;
008import org.openqa.selenium.edge.EdgeOptions;
009
010/**
011 * Provides a WebDriver implementation for Microsoft Edge.
012 *
013 * <p>This class extends {@link BaseDriverProvider} and implements methods to configure,
014 * create, and manage EdgeDriver instances. It also utilizes WebDriverManager
015 * to automatically download the appropriate EdgeDriver version.
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019public class EdgeDriverProvider extends BaseDriverProvider<EdgeOptions> {
020
021   /**
022    * Retrieves the type of the driver.
023    *
024    * @return A string representing the driver type, which is "EDGE".
025    */
026   @Override
027   protected String getDriverType() {
028      return "EDGE";
029   }
030
031   /**
032    * Creates a new instance of {@link EdgeOptions}, which holds the browser configuration.
033    *
034    * @return A new {@link EdgeOptions} instance.
035    */
036   @Override
037   public EdgeOptions createOptions() {
038      return new EdgeOptions();
039   }
040
041   /**
042    * Creates a new instance of {@link EdgeDriver} using the specified options.
043    *
044    * @param options The {@link EdgeOptions} instance containing the browser configurations.
045    * @return A new {@link EdgeDriver} instance.
046    */
047   @Override
048   public WebDriver createDriver(EdgeOptions options) {
049      return new EdgeDriver(EdgeDriverService.createDefaultService(), options);
050   }
051
052   /**
053    * Applies default arguments to the {@link EdgeOptions} instance.
054    *
055    * <p>These default arguments help optimize browser execution and enhance stability.
056    *
057    * @param options The {@link EdgeOptions} instance to modify.
058    */
059   @Override
060   public void applyDefaultArguments(EdgeOptions options) {
061      options.addArguments("--disable-gpu", "--no-sandbox", "--remote-allow-origins=*", "--guest");
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Applies additional arguments to enable headless mode in Edge.
066    *
067    * <p>Headless mode allows running tests without a visible UI, making execution
068    * faster and more efficient in CI/CD environments.
069    *
070    * @param options The {@link EdgeOptions} instance to modify.
071    */
072   @Override
073   public void applyHeadlessArguments(final EdgeOptions options) {
074      options.addArguments("--headless", "window-size=1920x1080", "--allow-insecure-localhost",
075            "--disable-dev-shm-usage");
076   }
077
078   /**
079    * Downloads the appropriate EdgeDriver version using WebDriverManager.
080    *
081    * <p>If a version is provided, it downloads the specified version.
082    * Otherwise, it automatically downloads the compatible driver version
083    * for the installed Edge browser.
084    *
085    * @param version The EdgeDriver version to download (optional).
086    */
087   @Override
088   public void downloadDriver(final String version) {
089      if (version == null || version.isEmpty()) {
090         WebDriverManager.edgedriver().setup();
091      } else {
092         WebDriverManager.edgedriver().driverVersion(version).setup();
093      }
094   }
095
096}
